item.title: NetScaler Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: NetScaler Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsNovember 11, 2025NetScaleris now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for NetScaler issues only.

item.title: Searching by Date and Exact Phrases Now Available in “CVE List Keyword Search” on CVE.ORG Website
item.description: Searching by Date and Exact Phrases Now Available in “CVE List Keyword Search” on CVE.ORG WebsitenewsNovember 12, 2025“CVE List Keyword Search” on the CVE.ORG has been updated based upon feedback back from users. As a reminder, this search is for the CVE List only. It will only searchCVE Records. To search the overall website, use the “Site Search” located to the right of the CVE List search box above.

item.title: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on October 29 Now Available
item.description: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on October 29 Now AvailablenewsNovember 18, 2025TheCVE Boardheld a teleconference meeting on October 29, 2025. Read themeeting minutes summary.

item.title: Videos fromCVE Program Technical Workshop 2025Now Available
item.description: Videos fromCVE Program Technical Workshop 2025Now AvailableblogBy CVE Program|November 18, 2025Videos from all 12 sessions of the virtualCVE Program Technical Workshop 2025, held October 22-23, 2025, are now available on theCVE Program Channel on YouTube. Meeting notes are availablehere. CVE Program workshops are a way for theCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)community to regularly collaborate on specific topics in a focused manner. Discussions are always informative, and many sessions result in creative recommendations from community members that directly impact and enhance the program.

item.title: Call for Speakers forVulnCon 2026Open Until December 22, 2025
item.description: Call for Speakers forVulnCon 2026Open Until December 22, 2025blogBy CVE Program|November 18, 2025TheCVE ProgramandFIRSTwill co-hostVulnCon 2026at the DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Hotel Paradise Valley – Scottsdale, in Scottsdale, Arizona, USA, on April 13-16, 2026. TheCall for Speakersdeadlineis December 22, 2025. See detailshere.

item.title: CVE Program Expands Partnership with European Union Agency for Cybersecurity (ENISA)—ENISA Is Now a Root in the CVE Program
item.description: CVE Program Expands Partnership with European Union Agency for Cybersecurity (ENISA)—ENISA Is Now a Root in the CVE ProgramblogBy CVE Program|November 20, 2025TheCVE Programis expanding its partnership with theEuropean Union Agency for Cybersecurity (ENISA)for managing the assignment ofCVE Identifiers (CVE IDs)and publication ofCVE Recordsfor the CVE Program. ENISA is now designated as aRootfor EU member states/EU authorities, EU CSIRTs network members, and cooperative partners under ENISA’s mandate, as well as otherCVE Numbering Authorities (CNAs)who choose ENISA as their Root. Read the ENISAnews release.

item.title: CVE Program Report for Quarter 3 Calendar Year (Q3 CY) 2025
item.description: CVE Program Report for Quarter 3 Calendar Year (Q3 CY) 2025blogBy CVE Program|December 2, 2025The CVE Program’s quarterly summary of program milestones and metrics for Q3 CY 2025.

item.title: REMINDER: Call for Speakers forVulnCon 2026Closes on December 22, 2025
item.description: REMINDER: Call for Speakers forVulnCon 2026Closes on December 22, 2025blogBy CVE Program|December 2, 2025The Call for Speakers (CFS) forCVE/FIRST VulnCon 2026closes onDecember 22, 2025.VulnCon 2026will be held on April 13-16, 2026, at the DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Hotel Paradise Valley – Scottsdale, in Scottsdale, Arizona, USA. Details about theCFSrequirements and submission process are availablehere.

item.title: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 256 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for December 1, 2025
item.description: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 256 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for December 1, 2025blogBy CVE Program|December 2, 2025

item.title: runZero, Inc. Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: runZero, Inc. Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsDecember 9, 2025runZero, Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities in runZero products, as well as vulnerabilities discovered by, or reported to, runZero that are not in another CNA’s scope.
